definitions.text: the back of a military formation or procession
the side of an object that is opposite its front
examples: his room was toward the rear of the hotel

definitions.text: the part of something that is furthest from the normal viewer
examples: he stood at the back of the stage
it was hidden in the rear of the store

definitions.text: the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
examples: he deserves a good kick in the butt
are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?

definitions.text: the side that goes last or is not normally seen
examples: he wrote the date on the back of the photograph

definitions.text: stand up on the hind legs, of quadrupeds
located in or toward the back or rear
examples: the rear door of the plane
